abstract.text: An object that finds items in images that people can interact with, such
as subjects, text, and QR codes.

abstract.text: Identify and extract information in the environment using the device’s camera, or in images that your app displays.
An object that represents the results of analyzing an image, and provides
the input for the Live Text interface object.
An interface that enables people to interact with recognized text, barcodes, and other objects in an image.
The results of analyzing an image for items that people can interact
with.
The delegate that handles the interaction callbacks.
The types of interactions that people can perform with the image.
A delegate that handles image-analysis and user-interaction callbacks for an interaction object.
A view that enables people to interact with recognized text, barcodes, and other objects in an image.
A delegate that handles image-analysis and user-interaction callbacks for an overlay view.
An object that finds items in images that people can interact with, such
as subjects, text, and QR codes.
The types of items that an image analyzer looks for in an image.
A configuration that specifies the types of items and locales that the
image analyzer recognizes.
Returns the data for providing a Live Text interaction with an image.
Returns the data for providing a Live Text interaction with a pixel
buffer image in the specified orientation.
Returns the data for providing a Live Text interaction with a bitmap
image in the specified orientation.
Returns the data for providing a Live Text interaction with an image in
the specified orientation.
Returns the data for providing a Live Text interaction with an image in
the specified orientation.
Returns the data for providing a Live Text interaction with a Core
Graphics image in the specified orientation.
Returns the data for providing a Live Text interaction with an image at
a URL and in the specified orientation.
Creates an image analyzer that identifies subjects, text, and machine-readable codes in
images.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the device supports image analysis.
The identifiers for the languages that the image analyzer recognizes.
Add a Live Text interface that enables users to perform actions with text and QR
codes that appear in images.

abstract.text: A thread-safe type whose values can be shared across arbitrary concurrent contexts without introducing a risk of data races.
